author: Gamers Nexus
description:
Sponsor: HAVN BF 360 Flow on Amazon https://geni.us/PRsOyke
Valve announced its Steam Frame VR headset, Steam Machine, and Steam Controller. We posted a video talking about all of that in depth, but we have more: This series of discussions and interviews with Valve's engineering teams focuses on thermal design, acoustics, and power delivery in the Steam Frame VR headset.

Get the rest of the news (and the Steam Machine info) here! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bWUxObt1efQ

Learn about the special backer tiers with bonus videos and digital content: https://store.gamersnexus.net/ai-dystopia
Or grab our new "RETRO I/O" Coaster Packs! https://store.gamersnexus.net/products/gn-drink-retro-io-coaster-pack-4-custom-3d-coasters-100x100mm
And our new Vaporwave Smiley T-shirt: https://store.gamersnexus.net/products/unhinged-vaporwave-smiley-t-shirt-cotton-black

Like our content? Please consider becoming our Patron to support us: http://www.patreon.com/gamersnexus

TIMESTAMPS

00:00 - Valve S
title: Valve Steam Frame Engineering Deep-Dive: Water Cooling, Thermals, Power, Acoustics
